cheese.3: Most cheese products require an import license and are subject to a quota.

fruits.3: Most cheese products require an import license and are subject to a quota.

livestock.3: A permit for importation must be obtained from APHIS before shipping from the country of origin.
livestock.4: All animal imports must be accompanied by a veterinary health certificate.
livestock.5: All imports are subject to inspection and to quarantine in certain ports.

meat.1: Meat, poultry, and meat or poultry products
meat.3: Other products are subject to APHIS regulations and to the provisions of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act (enforced by the FDA).

plants.3: Import permits are required for plant products, fruits, vegetables, roods, seeds, and others.

seeds.3: Shipments of seeds are detained for the drawing and testing of samples.
